/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++11 -O3 -ffast-math -Wall   CMakeFiles/foo_cuda.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/foo_cuda.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -o foo_cuda  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/targets/aarch64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/targets/aarch64-linux/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64:/usr/local/lib /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/librt.so /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudart.so libcuda_lib.a /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libglut.so /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libXmu.so /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libXi.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.4.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.4.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.4.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.4.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.4.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudev.so.3.4.1 -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
